description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Magnetized is a challenging one-button physics game.  Consisting of 3 different sets of 20 stages with different physical properties and simple but addictive one-button gameplay.
description.short: Magnetized is a challenging one-button physics game.  Consisting of 3 different sets of 20 stages with different physical properties and simple but addictive one-button gameplay.
